HomePage.signup: Sign Up for a Trial Lesson
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Afraid of failing TestAS and missing your chance to study in Germany? Join the center that has helped 95% of students pass—2 years leading in quality and materials in Vietnam!

whatIsTestAS.label: Smart Preparation
whatIsTestAS.title: Why Choose KNI?
whatIsTestAS.subtitle: The key to unlocking your dream university with confidence

crucial.title: Crucial for Success
crucial.description: TestAS is essential to ensure you get accepted into your dream university.

difficulty.title: Unexpected Difficulty
difficulty.description: 90% of test-takers realize TestAS is much harder than expected when they enter the exam room.

sample.title: Sample vs. Reality
sample.description: Official sample questions are far too easy compared to the actual TestAS exam.

trusted.title: Trusted by Top Students
trusted.description: KNI has successfully guided students with a 9.5 GPA and IELTS scores of 7.0–8.0.

preparation.title: Preparation Is Key
preparation.description: Don’t face a life-changing exam unprepared—studying the right way makes all the difference.

competition.title: Outshine the Competition
competition.description: Dedicated preparation with KNI helps you surpass others and seize top opportunities.

preparation.label: Preparation Guide
preparation.title: So, How Will You Prepare for TestAS?

0.title: Self-Study
0.description_1: It’s fine, but only if you already have IELTS 7.5 or German C1.
0.description_2: You have specialized knowledge and vocabulary in English or German, not just conversational language skills.
0.description_3: You don’t have to balance time with other subjects.
0.description_4: You have plenty of opportunities to retake TestAS multiple times.

1.title: Using Online Materials
1.description_1: You found a Preparation for TestAS book and think it’s the answer to everything?
1.description_2: Let me tell you, if you buy books from 2017 to 2025, 99% of the content remains the same. They only change the year to avoid copyright issues.
1.description_3: Even if you memorize every word in that book… you’ll soon realize how different it is from the actual exam.

2.title: Studying at a Study Abroad Center?
2.description_1: You mean the place where they reteach what’s in the Preparation for TestAS book?
2.description_2: If you need study abroad advice, find a study abroad expert.
2.description_3: But if you need a high TestAS score, you’ll need a TestAS specialist.

tutor.label: Since 2024
tutor.title: Your Companion on This Journey

description.item1: Former VGU MEN Student, Class of 18-22

tutor.quote: I believe that education in Germany is the best opportunity for Vietnamese students’ future careers due to its global quality and near-zero tuition fees. That’s why I strive to bring the best opportunities to the most determined young people with this goal.

roadmap.label: Our Process
roadmap.title: What Is the Learning Roadmap with KNI Like?
roadmap.description: We guide you step-by-step to prepare for TestAS with a clear and effective roadmap, ensuring you achieve your goals quickly.

0.title: Tips and Tricks
0.description: All the tips and tricks to solve questions quickly and simply.

1.title: Specialized Knowledge
1.description: Comprehensive specialized knowledge and key topics.

2.title: Specialized English
2.description: Specialized English vocabulary for all sections.

3.title: Latest Practice Tests
3.description: Practice tests continuously updated from the most recent exams.

cta.contact: Contact for Free Consultation + Trial Lesson

description.line1: Want to know everything about TestAS, VGU, or studying in Germany for your upcoming journey?
description.line2: Or do you want to experience a trial lesson with KNI?
description.line3: Fill out the form below, and we’ll get back to you within 48 hours.

FreeTestAS.label: Get Free Practice Tests
FreeTestAS.title: Free TestAS Practice Tests
FreeTestAS.quote: I didn’t expect the TestAS exam to be this difficult - 99% of TestAS test-takers

description.line1: Using official practice tests to prepare is risky—you might not get into your dream school.
description.line2: This Core Test set lets you know what you need to prepare for the TestAS exam. Plus, you’ll get a bonus Digital Core Test set so you can choose the test format that suits you best.

form.submit: Send Me the Practice Set Now!

ThankYou.title: Thank you
ThankYou.subtitle: The free practice set will arrive in your email within 5 minutes.
ThankYou.checkSpam: CHECK YOUR SPAM FOLDER if you don’t find it after the specified time.
ThankYou.freeVideoTitle: Want to try a free lesson?
ThankYou.freeVideoDescription: After solving the practice set, would you like to know if your results are good enough to achieve your desired score in the real test? Or would you like an expert to analyze your strengths and weaknesses through the test to help you create a suitable self-study plan?
ThankYou.contactPrompt: Register now and we’ll call you for a free consultation!

brevoForm.successMessage: Check your email to get started!
brevoForm.title: Preparation for TestAS 2025
brevoForm.description: Do you need the latest updated practice set to start your self-study journey without paying a fee? Leave your information, and the Core Test + Module set will arrive in no time!
brevoForm.emailLabel: Enter EMAIL (where to receive the practice set)
brevoForm.emailHelpText: Provide your email address to subscribe. For e.g abc@xyz.com
brevoForm.zaloLabel: Enter Zalo (a teacher will connect and answer all your questions)
brevoForm.zaloTooltip: The Zalo field must contain between 6 and 19 digits and include the country code (e.g. 849xxxxxxxx for Vietnam)
brevoForm.zaloHelpText: Please provide the correct phone number
brevoForm.moduleLabel: The Module practice set you need is:
brevoForm.submitButton: SEND ME THE PRACTICE SET NOW!
brevoForm.requiredError: Please fill in all the required fields!
